title: Where DP road/Proposed road passes through DRP area, the entire 100 percent FSI of the road may be given in the same site, on the remainder of the plot
clause_text: Where DP road/Proposed road passes through DRP area, the entire 100 percent FSI of the road may be given in the same site, on the remainder of the plot.
